allColls.description: A list of my fave albums from 2011

allColls.title: Ceci n’est pas une blog
allColls.description: The title says “This is not a blog” and plays on Rene Magritte's The Treachery of Images. It is also true.

allColls.title: You rocked my world, you know you did…
allColls.description: My relationship with rock music has been… well, rocky, for lack of a better word.

allColls.title: Review: Jamiroquai – Rock Dust Light Star
allColls.description: What I really like about this album is that it fills in any gaps made from the other Jamiroquai releases.
